summary: Fixes the new player home map markers added in Hearthfire to be settlement map markers instead of town map markers.
descriptionHtml:
Fixes the new player home map markers added in Hearthfire to be settlement map markers instead of town map markers. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/768?]here[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim
Hearthfire

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
